title: Group portrait of girl and fourteen women wearing nursing uniforms; including Carlotta Jordon, Emma Turner, Ola L. Robinson, Mathilda Leach, Estelle Mays, Anna B. Sinkfield, Eva Rogers, Ida L. Thomas, Anna Spear, Addie Fulton, Elsie M. Kenendy, Carrie Kidd, Helen Hunter, Alma Robinson, Rosetta Crittingham, and Denise Fulton, Eunice Cook seated in center wearing patch on sleeve that reads "...Red Cross", resting hands on open binder, gathered in interior with wood walls, Red Cross flag, and poster that reads "Arrive Alive Slow Down And Live", another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
